xml.question: Which guru did Balan meet before beginning his spiritual journey?
xml.explanation: He spoke of the meeting, “The Maharshi suddenly opened his eyes and looked straight into mine: I looked into his.... I felt that the Maharshi was, in that split moment, looking deep into me — and I was sure that he saw all my shallowness, confusions, faithlessness, imperfections, and fears. I cannot explain what happened.... I felt opened, cleaned, healed, and emptied!”
